dialogue.speaker: Alice
dialogue.message: I'll try to blend in with the group and avoid raising suspicion. Let's focus on keeping the village safe and trust each other for now.

dialogue.message: Based on my investigation, I believe Alice is the assassin. However, to maintain trust and ensure the safety of the village, I will not reveal this information yet. Let's work together to identify any potential threats and keep our community secure.
